Quick Run

  • 1: Inference and train with existing models and datasets
    • Inference with existing models
    • Test existing models on existing datasets
      • Prepare datasets
      • Prepare model checkpoint
      • Test existing models
    • Train predefined models on existing datasets
      • Prepare dataset
      • Training on single node
      • Training on multiple nodes
  • 2: Train with customized datasets
    • Prepare the customized dataset
      • Download dataset files
      • Prepare the dataset config file
      • Add dataset process module
    • Prepare other necessary configs
    • Train model
    • Test and inference
  • 3: Train with customized models and existing datasets
    • Prepare dataset
    • Prepare customized model
      • Define a new combine_model (e.g. BranchCombineLayer)
      • Import the module
      • Modify the config file
    • Prepare necessary configs
    • Train model
    • Test and inference

TUTORIALS

  • Tutorial: Engine
  • Tutorial 1: Learn about Configs
    • The configuration
      • The script configuration
      • The _base_ config file
    • Configuration Reading Process
    • FAQ
      • Use common variables in configs
  • Tutorial 2: Customize Datasets
    • Customize dataset in source code
      • Download dataset files
        • Prepare the dataset config file
        • Dataset process pipeline
    • Customize dataset in MIX-Kalman
      • Download dataset files
      • Prepare the dataset config file
        • An example of data configuration
      • Dataset process pipeline
        • add dataset_loader.py
        • add dataset_reader.py
        • add dataset_infocpler.py
  • Tutorial 3: Customize Models
    • Customize model in source code
    • Customize model in MIX-Kalman style
      • Build up model
        • Customize the model.py
      • Develop new components
        • Add a new embedding
        • Add a new encoder
        • Add a new backbone
        • Add new combine_model
        • Add new heads
        • Add new loss
      • An example of customized model config
  • Tutorial 4: Customize Schedule and Runtime Settings
    • Customize optimization schedules
      • Customize optimizer supported by Pytorch
      • Customize self-implemented optimizer
      • Additional settings
    • Customize FP16 schedules
    • Customize LR schedules
    • Customize train mode
    • Modify default runtime settings
      • Checkpoint config
      • Log config
      • Additional settings
  • Tutorial 5: Customize hooks
    • Customize self-implemented hooks
  • Tutorial 6: Finetuning Models
    • Modify dataset
    • Modify head
    • Modify training schedule
    • Set base configs
    • Use pre-trained model
